1.name: The Shawshank Redemption
1.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

2.name: Pulp Fiction
2.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

3.name: Little Women
3.description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

4.name: Forrest Gump
4.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

5.name: The Lion King
5.description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

6.name: Léon
6.description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

7.name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
7.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

8.name: The Mask
8.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

9.name: Speed
9.description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

10.name: Legends of the Fall
10.description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

11.name: True Lies
11.description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

12.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
12.description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

13.name: Natural Born Killers
13.description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

14.name: Major League II
14.description: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

15.name: Dumb and Dumber
15.description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen, to return the briefcase to its owner.

16.name: Stargate
16.description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

17.name: Tammy and the T-Rex
17.description: An evil scientist implants the brain of Michael, a murdered high school student, into a Tyrannosaurus. He escapes, wreaks vengeance on his high school tormentors, and is reunited with his sweetheart Tammy.

18.name: Wyatt Earp
18.description: The story of Wyatt Earp as he interacts and battles other famous figures of the Wild West era.

19.name: The Flintstones
19.description: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

20.name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
20.description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

21.name: The Crow
21.description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

22.name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
22.description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

23.name: The Little Rascals
23.description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

24.name: Street Fighter
24.description: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

25.name: Star Trek: Generations
25.description: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

26.name: Clerks
26.description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

27.name: Airheads
27.description: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

28.name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
28.description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

29.name: Chung Hing sam lam
29.description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

30.name: Heavenly Creatures
30.description: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

31.name: Police Academy: Mission to Moscow
31.description: The Russian government hires the veterans of the Police Academy (1984) to help deal with the Mafia.

32.name: Ed Wood
32.description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

33.name: Ri¢hie Ri¢h
33.description: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

34.name: In the Mouth of Madness
34.description: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

35.name: Little Giants
35.description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

36.name: Clear and Present Danger
36.description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

37.name: Disclosure
37.description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

38.name: Frankenstein
38.description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

39.name: Muriel's Wedding
39.description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

40.name: Blank Check
40.description: A young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters to whom it belongs are in pursuit.

41.name: Greedy
41.description: Rich, old uncle Joe is surrounded by relatives waiting/hoping for him to die while trying to look good and backstabbing the competition. What should he do?

42.name: Color of Night
42.description: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

43.name: My Girl 2
43.description: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more...

44.name: Reality Bites
44.description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

45.name: The Hudsucker Proxy
45.description: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

46.name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
46.description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

47.name: Sirens
47.description: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

48.name: Camp Nowhere
48.description: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

49.name: Love Affair
49.description: Ex-football star Mike Gambril meets Terry McKay on a flight to Sydney, which is forced to land on a small atoll. Both engaged to others, they become romantic on board the ship sent to take ...                See full summary »

50.name: The Pagemaster
50.description: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.
